description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Sony's decision to release some of their formerly PlayStation-exclusive first-party games to PC is paying off. The latest port, Ghost of Tsushima: Director's Cut, has become their biggest PC launch so far, surpassing God of War. In other news, Warner Bros.' MultiVersus is getting new fighters: Agent Smith from The Matrix franchise, and Jason Voorhees from Friday the 13th. Never thought we'd see the day when Marvin the Martian and Jason Voorhees would go toe-to-toe, but here we are. And speaking of crazy crossovers, the rumors are true: Call of Duty is getting Gundam content later this month. It's not confirmed if you get to pilot a Gundam or what, but it's a pretty cool idea nonetheless.

#IGN #Gaming #GhostOfTsushima
title: Ghost of Tsushima Is Sony's Biggest Single-player PC Launch Yet - IGN Daily Fix

description:
V Rising will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5) on June 11, 2024, and it is already available on Steam. Watch the latest V Rising trailer for another look at the threats you'll face and more from this open-world fantasy survival Action-RPG.

In V Rising, step into the shoes of a newly awakened vampire, construct your gothic castle, and explore an open world teeming with danger with seven regions to explore and 57 bosses to best. Hunt for blood alone or unite with a clan, battling alongside fellow vampires online. Rise in power and face the ancient tyrant Dracula himself in a showdown of epic proportions to rule the night.
title: V Rising - Official PlayStation 5 Date Reveal Trailer

description:
Animal Well is a Metroidvania game full of amazing discoveries, obtuse puzzles, and amazing discoveries you can only see upon solving those obtuse puzzles. While exploring the bottom right portion of its map, you can find these caged cats. There are five in total, and anybody with a heart would want to free them. We’ll show you how, then reveal the special reward you get for doing so. Be warned: rescuing the cats can only be done upon completing most of the game, so we will have to talk about some late encounters in this guide.

0:00 - Intro
0:43 - Prerequisites: Animal Flute, Top, & Lantern
1:17 - Cat #1
2:06 - Cat #2
2:28 - Cat #3
3:03 - Cat #4
3:24 - Cat #5
3:48 - The Cat Rescue Reward

Egg Locations and Puzzle Solutions
https://www.ign.com/wikis/animal-well/Egg_Locations_and_Puzzle_Solutions 

How to Get Past the Ostrich
https://www.ign.com/wikis/animal-well/How_to_Get_Past_the_Ostrich
title: Animal Well - How To Save The 5 Cats

description:
The Fall Guy arrives exclusively in homes on digital platforms where you can buy or rent movies with a never-before-seen Extended Cut tomorrow, May 21, 2024, from Universal Pictures Home Entertainment. From real-life stunt man and director David Leitch, the blockbuster director of Bullet Train, Deadpool 2, and Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw, comes his most personal film yet, full of over-the-top action and jaw-dropping, practical stunts.

Own The Fall Guy Extended Cut with an additional 20 minutes of never-before-seen footage featuring more action, more laughs and more stunts on digital tomorrow only when you purchase from participating retailers nationwide including Apple TV, Fandango at Home (formerly Vudu), Comcast Xfinity, Cox and Microsoft Movies & TV. The original film is available wherever you rent or buy movies.

#TheFallGuy #Clip #IGN
title: The Fall Guy - Exclusive Extended Cut Clip (2024) Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt

description: Get ready to stop the contamination. Check out the latest Call of Duty: Warzone & Modern Warfare 3 trailer for a look at the Season 4 free content update, available on May 29, 2024.
title: Call of Duty: Warzone & Modern Warfare 3 - Official Season 4 Launch Trailer

description:
Here's your look at the launch trailer for Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2, the upcoming sequel to Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice. In Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2, Senua returns in a brutal journey of survival through the myth and torment of Viking Iceland. Intent on saving those who have fallen victim to the horrors of tyranny, Senua faces a battle of overcoming the darkness within and without. Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 will be available on Xbox Series X/S and PC on May 21, 2024.

#SenuasSagaHellblade2 #Hellblade2 #IGN
title: Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Watch the cinematic launch trailer for MultiVersus featuring heroes and villains from the free-to-play platformer fighting game come together. The trailer features Wonder Woman and The Joker (DC), Velma (Scooby-Doo), Bugs Bunny and Marvin the Martian (Looney Tunes), Iron Giant (The Iron Giant), Rick Sanchez (Rick and Morty), Stripe (Gremlins), and Finn the Human and Cake the Cat, a variant of Jake the Dog (Adventure Time), as well as the reveal that Jason Voorhees from the Friday the 13th horror movie franchise and Agent Smith from The Matrix film series are coming to the game. Jason Voorhees will be available at launch, while Agent Smith will release later in the season.

MultiVersus will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) on May 28, 2024, with full cross-play and cross-progression support.

MultiVersus is a free-to-play platform fighter with an ever-expanding cast of iconic characters and legendary
title: MultiVersus - Official Launch Trailer

description:
See what your in-game day might look like while playing as a fresh-out-the-academy cop who's investigating his father's death in this gameplay explainer for The Precinct, a neon-noir sandbox game set in 1983.

#ThePrecinct #Gameplay #IGN
title: The Precinct: Official Gameplay Explainer – A Day in Averno City

description:
With so much crossover between anime and games how about we look at the 10 best anime that directly address games? Either as part of the plot, as an adaptation, or a direct spinoff. From rom-coms, to global hits, these are the 10 best anime to watch if you're into games.

#BestAnime #Gamers #IGN
title: 10 Best Anime to Watch for Gamers

description:
Check out the latest Deadpool & Wolverine teaser trailer for another look at the upcoming MCU movie starring Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Jackman, Emma Corrin, Morena Baccarin, Rob Delaney, Leslie Uggams, Karan Soni, and Matthew Macfadyen.

Kevin Feige, Ryan Reynolds, Shawn Levy and Lauren Shuler Donner produce with Louis D’Esposito, Wendy Jacobson, Mary McLaglen, Josh McLaglen, Rhett Reese, Paul Wernick, George Dewey and Simon Kinberg serving as executive producers. Deadpool & Wolverine is written by Ryan Reynolds & Rhett Reese & Paul Wernick & Zeb Wells & Shawn Levy. 

Deadpool & Wolverine opens in theaters on July 26, 2024.

#DeadpoolAndWolverine #Deadpool #Wolverine #IGN
title: Deadpool & Wolverine - Official Teaser Trailer (2024) Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Jackman
